pending_cases.details_and_present_status_of_appeal: YES I filed a discharge pettion in CRL.MP.No.25634/2019 in CC No.15/2019 before The special Court No. 1 for trial of cases related to MP/MLAs. the said petition was dismissed by the special Court by order dated 07/01/2022 Challenging the said order dated 07/01/2022, I filed Crl.R.C. No 510/2022 before the Madras High Court,and the Madras High court by order dated 11/12/2022 allowed the revision petition there by discharging me from the criminal case. the income tax department has filed SLP [CRL] No.5391 of 2021 before the supreme court and the same is pending
